song.englishname: Write Your Name On My Heart

english.segment1: God above. In You I live and breathe. And You will always be. Son of God. I owe my life to You. Your promises are true. Your love goes on and on forever
english.segment2: So write Your name upon my heart. Burn Your word into my mind. Make a temple of this body. Let Your Spirit move inside. I have wandered through the valley. And I have wondered who I am. So live in me, make Your mark. And write Your name upon my heart
english.segment3: God above. The first, the last, the same. All glory to Your name. My Jesus. It's You who I adore. Lamb of God and Savior. Your love goes on and on forever
english.segment4: Imprint on every part of me. The image of the Son. And complete in me the work. You have begun
